about_the_game:
"Spooky Mahjong - Tremble" awaits you! Prepare to face the supernatural, as evil spirits emerge on Halloween eve to engage you in this thrilling mahjong connect style puzzle. Immerse yourself in the eerie ambiance, leaving your fears behind, and embark on an exciting adventure through this haunted realm.

Bewitched by dark forces, this mahjong game becomes "endless," allowing you to play as much as you desire. Can you conquer level after level and prove your mastery of this chilling challenge?

FEATURES
  • Supernatural Halloween Theme: Immerse yourself in the chilling ambiance of Halloween with spooky visuals, ghostly symbols, and haunting imagery that create a captivating and immersive gaming experience.
  • Endless Adventure: The game is bewitched with dark forces, making it endless. Enjoy unlimited gameplay, conquering level after level without any restrictions, and challenge your skills to reach new heights.
  • Mahjong Connect Style Puzzle: Engage in a classic mahjong connect style puzzle, where you must match identical tiles and strategically clear the board to progress through the levels.
  • Eerie Tiles and Challenges: Encounter a variety of eerie tiles featuring ghostly elements, witch hats, pumpkins, and more, adding an extra layer of challenge and excitement to the gameplay.
  • Thrilling Fun and Relaxation: Leave your fears behind and let yourself be immersed in an enjoyable and relaxing mahjong experience. The game offers a perfect blend of excitement and entertainment for players of all ages.

name: Spooky Mahjong

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP\ Vista \ 7 \ 8 or higher
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: "Spooky Mahjong - Tremble" - a thrilling Halloween mahjong connect puzzle. Match identical tiles to clear the board and conquer levels in this endless adventure. Embrace the haunting ambiance, leave your fears behind, and enjoy an eerie and enjoyable mahjong experience! Happy gaming!
